questions: Are there stools in the image?
Are there balloons in the image?
Are there bananas in the image?
Are the balloons black in color?
Are the bananas yellow in color?
model_output:
yes Because there are stools present in the image.
yes Because there are balloons floating above the stools.
yes Because bananas are clearly visible inside black bowls on the stools.
no Because there are more than one stool visible in the image.
no Because there are less than four balloons in the image.
no Because there are more than three bananas visible in the image.
no Because the balloons are a combination of black and yellow, not all black.
yes Because the bananas displayed are yellow in color.
